plot: A young man visits an art exhibition for the first time in his adult life and tries to criticize works by Andy Warhol.
title: Who Is Warhol?
plot_es: A young man visits an art exhibition for the first time in his adult life and tries to criticize works by Andy Warhol.
plot_en: A young man visits an art exhibition for the first time in his adult life and tries to criticize works by Andy Warhol.
